title: Basic Garden & Plant Care
description: Whether it's a balcony garden or a collection of indoor plants, greenery adds life to your home. Understanding the basics of plant care is key to helping them thrive.
sentences: Understand the light requirements for each of your plants (full sun, partial shade, low light).
Most common houseplant deaths are due to overwatering, not underwatering.
Choose plants that are well-suited to the local climate in India.
Use pots with drainage holes to prevent water from stagnating at the roots.
Regularly check leaves for signs of pests or diseases.
dos: Water plants in the morning or evening, not in the hot midday sun.
Prune dead or yellowing leaves to encourage new growth.
Fertilize your plants during their growing season.
Rotate your indoor plants so all sides get light.
donts: Don't water on a fixed schedule; check the soil moisture first.
Don't place sun-loving plants in a dark corner.
Don't use a pot that is too large or too small for the plant.
Don't forget to dust the leaves of your indoor plants.
